concept.title: Illegal JavaScript Characters
concept.shortdesc: Characters and strings that are never allowed in JavaScript variables.

ul.li: ASCII characters with codes above 127 (unless multi-byte characters are enabled and charSet is populated appropriately)

conbody.p: Many variables, most notably products, hierarchy, and events, have additional limitations or syntax requirements. For individual variable limitations and syntax requirements, see the section corresponding to the s_account variable parameters.
